Title: People want change but not just the typical politically correct sort. Women are fed up with being considered a minority while the State Opposition in Western Australia is calling for a moratorium on power disconnections due to rising sky-high bills. The Aussie government is also cracking down on wage theft while the Finance Minister has given the strongest signal yet that taxes on gas companies will soar. Meanwhile the transport sector is revving up and the buses in Australia are getting an upgrade.
